Metadata.Title: Dressed to Kill Bigots
Metadata.Description: Toby Hicks is premium frat boy. His billion dollar empire is built  on bigotry; a gay conversion camp facading as a reality show called 'Haze or Die,' where freshmen discarded by their rich parents have to undergo humiliating initiations, sometimes dying in the process.Hicks must be dealt with as soon as possible, as well as the guards nearby his room as they are in on it. You will have to kill the guard in front of your exit as collateral damage.Go kill the homophobes.
